title: leaver buster what the hell
body:
I was going through my first ranked game and guess what ... I got stuck at the screen before entering the game
I closed the launcher reopened it twice then finally theyve made a rematch 
And ofcours the goddamn leaver buster for 5 match made games 20min 
W H A T   D A   F U Q ?
riot please fix this and remove the leaver buster
Its not my fault {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: It sounds like your network is failing to reach the game server and leaving you behind.  Having a history of leaves can result in [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), so it's crucial to get this fixed up.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to to help, and test it out in a custom game to be sure.  Hit me up if you have any questions.

Hi just got leaver buster agian for the same thing 100 minutes litterally spent trying to get it off But whenever I enter to the champion select it laggs and yeah 100 minutes spent doing nothing thanks riot
Sorry to hear you're still having the issue.  :/  Have you gone over each step of the guide yet?
just to let you know and make your day , I meant 100 minutes aside the ones of the leaver buster . It means I went through 200 minutes ...

I really hate this sometimes- like my internet will just die on me, ill have just finished a leavebuester set from the last time it happened, and its the first game- AND ILL GET ANOTHER 100 minutes sitting around before we can even find a game. I mean yeah I get the leavebuster, but not 5 games, and not 20 minute wait. maybe if they did it 30 mins, one time. I would still be sane. but this can just get too much
